title: Beyond Level 30
body:
I am confused about this , for example :
â—˜ i am level 31 and i need to do 2,000 XP , at level 32 number of xp to reach will be same like level 31 (2,000) ? 

Cause if is not this will be so hard , specially to receive blue essence ..

replies.body: Our[ Preseason FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115012640908) has a pretty in-depth guide, but it shouldn't seem too long until around every milestone of ~25 levels.
